name: Vela
description:
On cold winter nights in the inn, Vela sparks to life. Vela must journey back to the fireplace in order to bring warmth and light back to the bleak, cold inn. Along the way, she must dodge the harsh weather and rambunctious guests in order to return home. Vela's friends, other small fire entities, have gotten lost on their way to the fireplace. Best to locate them and bring them back with you!

Vela is a 2D-platformer made by four OCAD University students:

  • Annika Aarnio: Programmer, Music, Playtesting
  • Alice Huang: Backgrounds, Level Design, Start Screen + Win Screen UI
  • Danielle Martin: Character Animation, Final Presentation, Playtesting
  • Francesca Puchiele: Story, Objects, Sound Effects, Music
